name: Special Pasta
shortDescription: A standard tape measure is used for all kinds of field measurements, such as setting heights for switches and outlets,

name: Special Soup
shortDescription: A hammer is used to secure electrical boxes equipped with nail-on brackets to wall studs and other framing members in a home. Youâ€™ll also need one to drive wire staples when anchoring new electrical cable to framing members.

name: Special Salads
shortDescription: A small level, such as a torpedo level, fits easily in a tool pouch and is used to make sure your work is level and plumb. A great installation starts with level boxes and straight switch and outlet receptacles.

name: Special Pasta
shortDescription: Electrical repair and improvement work involves a lot of dark places, from attics and basements, to wall and ceiling cavities, to the insides of electrical boxes. A tactical flashlight is needed as much for safety as it is for convenience.

name: Special Soup
shortDescription: A utility knife, or box cutter, is handy for cutting sheathing from non-metallic (Romex) cable, to cut off electrical tape, and to open cardboard boxes.

name: Special Salads
shortDescription: Electrical repair and improvement work involves a lot of dark places, from attics and basements, to wall and ceiling cavities, to the insides of electrical boxes. A tactical flashlight is needed as much for safety as it is for convenience.
